plot: Jeff must leave his house because he's allergic to the guard dog Susie bought. Larry tries to get Jeff and Susie's daughter Sammy to give up the dog but she won't. He looks to please both Jeff's family and friends who also want the dog.

Jeff must leave his house because he's allergic to the guard dog Suzie bought. Larry tries to get Jeff and Suzie's daughter Sammy to give up the dog, but she won't. Larry looks for a way to please both Jeff's family and some friends who also want the dog.—halo1k
